title: Antifa Murders Trump Supporter in Portland
description: Steven covers the latest surprising CDC statistics on COVID and reviews the Portland shooting of a Trump supporter by Antifa protesters, as well as other recent attempted murders committed in the name of #BlackLivesMatter. Lastly, we update you on the case of Kyle Rittenhouse, the young man charged with first-degree murder for defending himself from rioters in Kenosha
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
